author: kelvingoodson
msg: Applying patch for TUSCANY-1429 as supplied by Fuhwei.  Note that in the branch in changed the SDOHelper/SDOUtil APIs (since they have never been released), rather than deprecating the old interfaces and adding new ones.  I have posted an intention to do the same in the trunk on the mailing list.
